shortdesc.ph: Gets the SDK's current monotonic time.
Gets the current monotonic time of the SDK.

section.p: In custom video or audio capture scenarios, to ensure audio-video sync, call this method to get the SDK's current monotonic time (in milliseconds) and pass it into the timestamp parameter of the captured or . Monotonic time refers to a time sequence that increases monotonically over time.
